subject: Investing
title: Hot Wallets vs. Cold Wallets
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Hot Wallets vs. Cold Wallets.

hook.text: A man threw away a hard drive holding 7,500 Bitcoin‚Äîworth over $500 million‚Äîand can never recover it.

buildup.text: A crypto wallet stores the private keys that prove you own your coins. Lose the key, lose the coins.

discovery.text: Hot wallets are connected to the internet for convenience. Cold wallets are offline for maximum security.

twist.text: Hot wallets are vulnerable to hacks. Cold wallets are vulnerable to physical loss and user error.

climax.text: Best practice: keep spending amounts in a hot wallet and long-term holdings in a cold hardware wallet.

punchline.text: Hot for daily use, cold for storage. Temperature matters in crypto security.

quiz.question: What is a cold wallet?
options: A wallet stored in a cold room
An offline wallet for maximum security
